telephony_line_phone_codec_info1: Optimise the quality of your communications by influencing the codec primarily employed by your line.
telephony_line_phone_codec_info2: As the configured codecs influence the bandwidth used, consider checking that your speed is sufficient for the chosen codecs.
telephony_line_phone_codec_info3: To check your Internet access speed, go to http://voip.ovh.fr.
telephony_line_phone_codec_info4: Please note that the g722 codec will only be used during calls between OVHcloud lines.
telephony_line_phone_codec_load_error: Oops! An error occurred while loading the line.
telephony_line_phone_codec_edit_codec_pr: Choose a priority order for your codecs:
telephony_line_phone_codec_edit_codec_sa: Oops! An error occurred while saving your codecs.
telephony_line_phone_codec_edit_codec_lo: Oops! An error occurred while loading the codecs.
telephony_line_phone_codec_edit_codec_au: Automatic codecs (this option is in beta and makes codecs negotiation more flexible).
telephony_line_phone_codec_bulk_all_succ: The codecs have been modified for the selected services.
telephony_line_phone_codec_bulk_some_suc: The codecs have been modified for {{ count }} of the selected services.
telephony_line_phone_codec_bulk_error: The codecs could not be modified for the following service(s):
telephony_line_phone_codec_bulk_on_error: Oops! An error occurred while modifying the codecs.
